titles.title: A bill to reauthorize the Mni Wiconi Rural Water Supply Project.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary:
10/31/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Mni Wiconi Project Act of 1988 to authorize appropriations for the Mni Wiconi Rural Water Supply Project, South Dakota, through 2013.
